name: Highway Junkie
description: Exciting race on the highway! A variety of modes of physics and tight traffic will not let you relax!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 core cpu Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon 9600 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and newer Processor: 2+ core cpu Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 400 MB available space
